V.iii.12.B.1.a
.
Definition: TBI
The term
traumatic brain injury
(TBI) means the physical, cognitive, and/or behavioral/emotional residual disability resulting from an event of external force causing an injury to the brain.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section BÂ - Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI)
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section B
